title.en: Fukushuu Kareshi - Dekiai Shachou no Kao ni wa Ura ga aru

altTitles.ja-ro: Fukushuu Kareshi - Dekiai Shachou no Kao ni wa Ura ga aru

altTitles.ja: 復讐カレシ〜溺愛社長の顔にはウラがある〜

description.en: The gentle hand that touches me, the look in your eyes, it's all a lie. This is a fake relationship for revenge. She is seen crying alone in the hallway by the president of the company, Shun Satori. He is the sergeant-at-arms of a large corporation and is so good-looking that everyone looks back at him. He offers to take revenge on her by becoming her false lover. Why would he go to such lengths for me? Maika plays the role of the lover, as it seems that Sunao also wants to cooperate with her. Her kind encouragement and sweet whispers are all supposed to be "acting," but... she almost misunderstands. But even so, Maika's heart is gradually filled with contentment--a love story about a man and a woman connected by their mutual interests. However, it seems that Shun still has a secret...?
